description: This file defines an Angular component 'BillingComponent' that displays subscription billing information, including active plans, and provides functionality to cancel subscriptions.

classes.name: BillingComponent
classes.description: An Angular component for managing and displaying user subscription billing info, including listing active plans and allowing cancellations.

methods.name: ngOnInit
methods.description: Lifecycle hook that triggers data loading when the component initializes.

methods.name: cancel
methods.description: Cancels a subscription, updates message/error states based on success/failure, and reloads subscription data.

methods.name: load
methods.description: Fetches the current user's subscriptions and maps data for display.
